name: Lyra
character_backstory: Lyra, adapting to the needs of the Shield Bearers, has taken up the spear and shield to contribute more effectively to the guild's defensive tactics, especially their signature Phalanx formation.
personal_ambitions_goals: To become a versatile warrior who can switch between offensive and defensive roles as needed, proving her value in all aspects of combat.
irl_backstory: Controlled by a real human player
memories: Keenly remembers logging into the game, motivated to adapt and excel in different combat roles.

appearance.notable_characteristics: Resolute expression, showcasing readiness for both offensive and defensive battles

notable_affinities.general_reputation: Recognized for her adaptability and growing expertise in different combat styles
